summary: This is a February 4, 2019 email from an Associate U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a monthly unit update report. The document appears to be internal DOJ correspondence related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Associate U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Sender of the email and report
persons.context: The person sending the monthly unit update report from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Monthly Unit Update Report Transmission
events.description: An Associate U.S. Attorney sends a monthly unit update report via email.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Internal DOJ correspondence dated February 4, 2019 regarding a monthly unit update report.
Originates from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00078217).
